alert.note: Alert for Pike; Scott (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 22 at 9:46AM CDT until April 26 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at Valley City. Illinois River at Hardin. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River at Valley City. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, The road to Norbut Fish and Wildlife area is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 13.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 14.1 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Illinois River Valley City 14.0 13.9 Fri 9 am 14.1 14.1 13.9 13.6 13.3 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
